title: Fix: update README to reflect recent features
description:
## Feedback Analysis

**Phase 1: Missing Command Documentation**
1. Add review/approve/reject commands to Commands section
   and Lifecycle section (review state + transitions)
2. Add link/unlink commands with usage examples
3. Document --format=short for list command

**Phase 2: Missing Flag/Option Documentation**
4. Add --type flag to create, edit, list examples
5. Add --parent flag to create and list examples
6. Add --roots flag to list examples
7. Add --label flag to history examples

**Phase 3: New Concepts**
8. Document user identity (WORK_USER env, git user.name,
   "system" fallback) — new section or note
9. Document issue types (feature, bug, chore) with
   default_type config
10. Document parent/child relationships (epics) — how
    show displays children, no grandchildren rule

**Phase 4: Config Example Update**
11. Update config.json example to include types,
    default_type, and review state in transitions
